Running Spyrelets¶

To run a written spyrelet, first make sure spyre is activated by looking for (spyre) on the left side of cmd. If not, activate spyre:

activate spyre

Note

Sometimes, your path will not be set to envs and the above command will not work. In this case, look for the environment:

conda list envs

After finding the path the spyre environment, activate it with “activate” followed by the full path to the spyre env.

If spyre is not installed, refer to Installation.

Navigate to your code path, and go to ~/code/spyre/testing. To run the spyrelet, (let the spyrelet name be “example”):

python main.py example

The spyrelet name must be passed into the argument of main.py.
